alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:31PM CDT until August 12 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Central Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Huntsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Gurley, Woodville, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville, Pleasant Groves, Paint Rock and Maysville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
